name: Isometric Grid
description: Isometric game map widget for creating Habbo Hotel-like environments. Supports map editing and game modes with tile-based navigation.
author: StickerNest

setMap.description: Set the entire map data (tiles, walls, furniture)

addCharacter.description: Add a character to the map with id, position, and sprite data

moveCharacter.description: Move a character to a new position {id, x, y}

setTile.description: Set a tile at position {x, y, type, elevation}

tileClicked.description: Emitted when a tile is clicked {x, y, tile, mode}

characterMoved.description: Emitted when a character moves {id, from, to}

characterClicked.description: Emitted when a character is clicked {id, character}

pathRequest.description: Emitted when pathfinding is requested {characterId, from, to}
